original_text: Daniel declared, “I saw in my vision by night, and behold, the four winds of heaven were stirring up the great sea.
korean_text: 다니엘이 진술하여 이르되 내가 밤에 환상을 보았는데 하늘의 네 바람이 큰 바다로 몰려 불더니

sentences.original_text: I saw in my vision by night,
the four winds of heaven were stirring up the great sea.
sentences.korean_translation: 하늘의 네 바람이 큰 바다를 치고 있더라.
